word: 1-8. Guard the Church Against Deception.--The instruction in this epistle is addressed to the church of God at Corinth, and directed to be sent to every place where there were companies of saints who had faith in Jesus Christ. As members of the church of Christ, they are said to be "sanctified in Christ Jesus," and "called to be saints." By baptism they pledged themselves to a ministry of good works in seeking to save others who knew not the truth.
